humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions that one out of the two sentinel lymph nodes has a metastatic involvement (1/1 = 100%). This corresponds to N1 stage based on the new rule 12 (N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes). The report also provides the pTNM classification: pT2 pN1 Mx, which further supports the N1 stage prediction.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has cancer that has metastasized to 1 out of 2 sentinel lymph nodes (right axillary sentinel lymph node: one lymph node, total replacement by metastatic adenocarcinoma; right axillary sentinel lymph node #2: one lymph node, no evidence of metastatic carcinoma). This corresponds to an N1 stage.
